resources.string: OTP has been sent to your e-mail address, please enter\nthe OTP to verify the email

Certainly Here\'s a random sentence for each line:
The sun dipped below the horizon, casting a warm glow across the tranquil sea. In the bustling city, neon lights flickered, creating a vibrant tapestry of colors. A gentle breeze whispered through the ancient oak trees, rustling their leaves in harmony. The aroma of freshly brewed coffee wafted through the air, enticing passersby on the busy street. As night fell, a symphony of crickets and frogs serenaded the moonlit meadow. Lost in thought, she gazed at the stars, each one telling a story of the cosmos. The old bookstore exuded a nostalgic scent of worn pages and literary treasures. Laughter echoed in the courtyard as friends gathered around a crackling bonfire. A solitary cat prowled the narrow alley, its eyes gleaming in the dim light. With a flick of the paintbrush, the artist brought life to the blank canvas, capturing the essence of a fleeting moment.
